reapack.name: MachineView.lua
reapack.desc: Hackey-Machines: An interface plugin for REAPER 5.x and up designed to mimick the machine editor in Jeskola Buzz.

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + First upload. Basic functionality works, but cannot add new machines from the GUI yet.

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Fixed bug in initial position assignments.

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Added display option (track name (where non-default) versus effect name). Toggle with F3.

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Added ability to route from nested track to master (reorganizing the tracklist)

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Added ability to add machines from a menu (outer mouse button). Still requires user to make machine list. Should split file out at some point to allow customization per user without it interfering with what is being updated in the repo.

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Bugfix that avoids sinks from being unnecessarily refreshed

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Fix in verlet integration routine for graph-force algorithm. + Fix when opening the same project file. + Continuous storage of positions.

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Add option to hide machines (Toggle show all with F4).

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Minor tweak simulation algorithm to ignore unmatched machines.

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Add selection ability. + Fixed bug with arrows taking precedence over block on top of them.
